attributes.review: This app is believed to be created by the Chinese government in disguise as a political campaign tactic. Immediately after opening the app, it asks for your phone number so they can track you location and data off your phone number. BE AWARE.
attributes.title: Chinese Hackers. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: It’s an awful app it took weeks to download and when it finally does it just a bunch of adds for game to play or closes the app out on its own😡. Definitely don’t recommend
attributes.title: Definitely don’t recommend

attributes.review: This app is awful. All it does is try to get money out of us. This whole Presidency has been about money, and stealing it from the the American people. There is nothing of substance on this app, just propaganda and lies. Just like his presidency, this app is a joke, and fraudulent.
attributes.title: Remove Trump

attributes.review: First of all, the app took so long to download onto my phone, it literally took hours! Then, when I tried opening the app to help make America great again it kept glitching. The app would either close out or just open another app. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS APP! IT IS A WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY!
attributes.title: Unsatisfied

attributes.review: I would definitely want to support my president trump when i downloaded this app but when i did my apps started to glitch and freeze up and started playing this song”shawtylikeamelodyinmyhead” and i was so confused and when this happened i don’t like trump VOTE BIDEN 2020 MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN ABLOISH ICE! #blm #mlm #almaft
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP!

attributes.review: i downloaded it and it took 4 hours on perfect wifi. and as soon as i opened it my phone crashed and all my messages were deleted upon turning it back on. do not download. and apple will be hearing from me and my team of lawyers.
attributes.title: VIRUS

attributes.review: So, I downloaded this app thinking that it would be the best app to use for my beloved 🥰president trump’s campaign for his re-election but I was wrong. The app started to glitch and it started saying horrible things on the screen that are NOT good for my three sons and two daughters to see. 🤮🤢🤮🤢🤮🤢🤮🤮
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HARMFUL FOR OUR CHILDREN

attributes.review: While this app is rated 17+, it is still highly inappropriate for it is fill with explicit and sexual photos. The app forced me to download the pictures to my device, and now I cannot delete them. It’s a really disgusting app, and the developers of it must have sick minds. 🤢🤮💩
attributes.title: It’s pornic

attributes.review: This app took 69 days to download! I don’t even understand why it took so long and I’m not the only one with this problem. My trump supporter friend tried to download it too and Hers took 2 months! Horrible app and Why is this even on the App Store!  Not worth your time DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.review:
Omg this app took foOooOooOOEverrr to download and when I opened the app it showed trumps face which was ofc hideous 🤮 and he looks like a wrinkly Cheeto puff-
No I take that back he’s worse then a Cheeto puff 
A n y w a y s, 
he started attacking me on the app and omg it was so scarrrryy 😱 so ofc I deleted it 
Don’t waste your time on this clown of an app 🤡
attributes.title: Bunker Boy 🤩✨✨
